title: Control Plane API skeleton (/workflows, /runs)
body:
**Description**
Scaffold REST/gRPC for /workflows and /runs with authn/z stubs.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] POST /workflows stores signed manifest and returns digest
- [ ] GET/POST /runs basic lifecycle (start, status)
- [ ] Unauth requests return 401

**Definition of Done**
- [ ] Unit tests ≥80% for handlers
- [ ] OTel traces/logs present
- [ ] Docs: API reference stub

**Dependencies**
- None

title: Scheduler & Queue MVP
body:
**Description**
Priority queue with lease/heartbeat; retries with backoff+jitter.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] p95 decision < 500ms @ 100 RPS
- [ ] Retries follow policy (maxAttempts, backoff)
- [ ] Leases renewed; orphan detection

**DoD**
- [ ] Load test profile checked into repo
- [ ] Metrics exported (scheduler.latency, queue.depth)
